name: Shooter Duty Mission
description:
Join the commando forces and play the all time favorite Commando Assault Game with completely new challenging missions in "Shooter Duty Mission". Get onto the street and shoot your target to complete the missions. "Shooter Duty Mission" is the most adventurous game with powerful enemies ready to shoot you. Find all your enemies and shoot them before your enemies shoot you out.!
"Shooter Duty Mission" is designed with thrilling 3D graphics with battle ground sound effects. Keep your eyes wide open and look out your for the enemies around you using the location viewer. The game has intuitive touch mode gaming controls with ability to shoot using one touch control and change the weapons instantly. Use the zoom in and zoom out feature to make the perfect target. Change the right rifles for shooting or choose the weapon to kill the enemies. Complete the missions and be on top of the global leaderboard by challenging them.
The game "Shooter Duty Mission" is a street war game based on the thrilling story line. The battlefield is a land of dangerous enemies and you are the sniper shooter who is given the duty to protect the city from getting destroyed by the enemies. Lead the commando forces. The game is perfect for all age group players who love shooting games. Put on your shooting skill hat and be the sharp shooter.

************************
GAME FEATURES
************************
“Shooter Duty Mission” is the most unique commando mission game. Here are the features of the game that make it the best among all shooter games -
• Amazing 3D Graphics with fascinating backgrounds
• Wide variety of weapons to choose from
• Compete with players worldwide on the global leaderboard
• Multiple game levels with challenging enemies
Download the most thrilling shooting game "Assault Duty Mission" and enjoy the unlimited in the shooting game. Get the game in your smart phone and play the anti-terrorist shooting game.!

************************
SAY HELLO
************************
We are constantly working hard on making the “Shooter Duty Mission” game better and more entertaining for you. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the “Shooter Duty Mission” game, do not forget to rate us on play store and share among your friends.
